nodes.text: It is not the case of 'only in a america', montalban was australian and he was a poster here. A prominent australian creation supporter is Ken Ham although I doubt he posts here. But they are certainly stubborn. I have failed to have a discussion with any creationist despite repeated attempts.
But was this recent version of Chritianity exported form America? I know these sorts make us laughingstocks to many in other countries, especially the televangelists.
